about_the_game: An eclectic group of friends who are addicted to technology decide to celebrate the New Year in an isolated gothic mansion that has no access to the internet - which is a big first for them! As soon as they arrive, strange things start to happen and the party quickly turns into a nightmare. With no way to escape, they will need to work together in order to get out alive.

About the Video

An eclectic group of friends who are addicted to technology decide to celebrate the New Year in an isolated gothic mansion that has no access to the internet - which is a big first for them! As soon as they arrive, strange things start to happen and the party quickly turns into a nightmare. With no way to escape, they will need to work together in order to get out alive.
